passages.text:
Before you lies a small stage.  A rotten piano, imploded in on itself, sits atop, resting beneath a shattered engraving of women waving torches.

[[p:What's the deal with this auditorium?  Seems a little out of place in an infirmary.]]

links.name: p:What's the deal with this auditorium?  Seems a little out of place in an infirmary.
links.link: p:What's the deal with this auditorium?  Seems a little out of place in an infirmary.

passages.name: Untitled Passage

passages.text:
Julia::...

Jasper::She's not listening.

[[p:Hello?  You there?]]
[[p:Come here often?]]
passages.name: p:What's the deal with this auditorium?  Seems a little out of place in an infirmary.

passages.text:
Julia::I...

Julia::Yes, sorry.  What's the matter?

[[p:I'm guessing you visit this auditorium often?->Get Going]]

links.name: p:I'm guessing you visit this auditorium often?

passages.name: p:Hello?  You there?

passages.text:
Julia::No, I don't.

Jasper::Liar.

Julia::We should keep moving.  We still need to sign you in at the front desk.
passages.name: Get Going
